lines: 1. Watchman blow the gospel trumpet Every soul a warning give Whosoever hears the message Lift Him up, this precious Saviour,
Refrain : Blow the trumpet, trusty watchman, Blow it loud o'er land and sea; God commissions, sound the message Every captive may be free.
2. Sound it loud o'er every hilltop, Gloomy shade and sunny plain; Ocean depths repeat the message! Full salvation's glad
3. Sound it in the hedge and highway Earth's dark spots where exiles roam; Let it tell all things are ready, Father waits to welcome home.
4. Sound it for the heavy laden, Weary, longing to be free; Sound a Saviourâ€™s invitation Sweetly saying, Come to me.
